about_the_game:
Dan's odyssey is an arcade like arena top down shooter.
you fight shapes in a futuristic setting with the objective
of completing the boss fights, upgrading your stats and
beating the high score

key features:

- satisfying gunplay and movement

- ability to slow down time or deploy your turret for a helping hand

- unlock upgrades points to upgrade
your deployable turret weapon and health

- classic arcade style beat the high score
- great sound track
detailed_description:
Dan's odyssey is an arcade like arena top down shooter.
you fight shapes in a futuristic setting with the objective
of completing the boss fights, upgrading your stats and
beating the high score

key features:

- satisfying gunplay and movement

- ability to slow down time or deploy your turret for a helping hand

- unlock upgrades points to upgrade
your deployable turret weapon and health

- classic arcade style beat the high score
- great sound track

name: Dan's Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-7100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX750TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements is an estimate
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An arcade arena top down shooter. fast paced action with a great sound-track. shoot your way through the approaching enemy shapes, upgrade your character and beat the high score.
